name: washing_finish
description: This function is used to set the completion time for the washing machine cycle.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the completion time.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to set the completion time.

parameters.name: finishTime
parameters.description: The specific time to set as the completion time for the washing machine cycle.
